definition: variant of 紅彤彤|红彤彤[hong2 tong1 tong1]
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: The children had glowing cheeks after race.
sentences.chinese: 孩子跑完步臉蛋兒紅通通的。

sentences.english: Bright red, like a string of lanterns, pretty great.
sentences.chinese: 紅通通的，像一串串燈籠，好看極了。

sentences.english: Mom bought me many big red apples. They are my favorite.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽買了許多紅通通的大蘋果，我特別愛喫。

sentences.english: He had a red nose that looked like a cherry.
sentences.chinese: 他紅通通的鼻子看起來像顆櫻桃。

sentences.english: You could tell from his red face that he realized he was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 從他紅通通的臉可以看出他知道自己錯了。

sentences.english: Without sunscreen i'll get as red as a lobster.
sentences.chinese: 沒有擦防曬霜我會曬得和龍蝦一樣紅通通的。

sentences.english: He came into the room, his ears red with cold.
sentences.chinese: 他回到了房子裏，耳朵凍得紅通通的。

sentences.english: You could tell from his face that he knew he was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 從他紅通通的臉的可以看出他知道自己錯了。

sentences.english: The audience all laugh blushed essent, slap all clap to pain.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆們個個笑得臉紅通通的，巴掌都拍痛了。

sentences.english: The burning light-wick appears as a whole splotch of redness in the murkiness of her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 燃燒的燈芯在朦朧中變得紅通通的一片。

sentences.english: He broke away from me to my arms, looking at my red eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他掙脫了我靠近我懷裏，看着我紅通通的眼睛。

sentences.english: Mother bought many big bright red apples. They are my favorite.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽買了許多紅通通的大蘋果，我特別愛喫。

definition: to twitch/to throb/a spasm/to extract and use
chicken in rice wine/also translated drunken chicken
